021287-d-02-09-87-RFP.Narrative: AT APPROX 5:45AM,MONDAY,02/09/87,THE AC-9 ACCA YD JOB ASSIGNMENT WORKING 11:00PM TO 7:00AM WAS INVOLVED IN A SWITCHING IMPACT WHILE WORKING ON THE LADDER,SOUTH END OF THE NORTH YD.THE ACCIDENT OCCURRED WHEN NO.3 TRACK NORTH YD CONTAINING 85 CARS SET OFF FROM CSX TRAIN 902 AT 3:30AM,02/09/87,ROLLED OUT THE SOUTH END AND SIDESWIPED ENGINE 83 WHICH WAS SHOVING A CUT OF CARS INTO NO.5 TRACK NORTH YD.ENGINE 83 RECEIVED CONSIDERABLE DAMAGE TO THE LEFT SIDE IN THE AREA OF THE CAB.CARS SBD 251619 AND DRGW 61867 RECEIVED DAMAGE AND WILL BE FORWARDED TO THE SHOP.EENGINEER W.M.FISHER SUSTAINED A PERSONALINJURY TO RIGHT KNEE DISMOUNTING ENGINE 83 AT THE TIME OF THE INCIDENT.THE INVESTIGATION REVEALED SEVERAL FACTORS CONTRIBUTED TO THE CUT OF CARS ROLLING OUT OF NO.3 TRACK;(1) NOT A SUFFICIENT NUMBEROF HAND BRAKES BEING APPLIED TO THE CUT OF CARS SETTING ON NO.3 TRK(2) SEVERE WEATHER CONDITIONS,RAIN,HIGH WINDS WITH GUSTS UP TO 50 MPH,(3) VIBRATION FROM THE ENGINES WORKING ON THE LADDER TRACK.NoneNoneNoneNoneNone

WHEN REVERSE MOVE WAS BEING MADE, WEST WHEEL ON A SINGLE AXLE CAR TTUX 121648 DERAILED AT SWITCHTHAT LEADS FROM THE BUCK MAIN TO THE OUTBOUND LEAD.
